languages.text: {n}Андровета-Фи пытается закрыть собой машину, но Джиневри кладет ладонь на рукоять пистолета.{/n}
{n}Androveta-Phi moves to shield the machine with her body, but freezes when she sees Jinevri grasp the handle of her pistol.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Андровета-Фи пытается закрыть собой машину, но Джиневри кладет ладонь на рукоять пистолета.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Androveta-Phi moves to shield the machine with her body, but freezes when Jinevra grips the handle of her pistol.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Phi fait mine de s'interposer entre vous et la machine, mais elle s'immobilise en voyant Jinevri saisir la poignée de son pistolet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi moves to shield the machine with her body, but freezes when she sees Jinevri grasp the handle of her pistol.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Androveta-Phi fait mine de s'interposer entre vous et la machine, mais elle s'immobilise en voyant Jinevra saisir la poignée de son pistolet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Fi se mueve para escudar a la máquina con su cuerpo, pero se detiene al ver que Jinevri se lleva la mano a la pistola.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi moves to shield the machine with her body, but freezes when she sees Jinevri grasp the handle of her pistol.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Androveta-Phi se mueve para escudar a la máquina con su cuerpo, pero se detiene al ver que Jinevra se lleva la mano a la pistola.{/n}

languages.text: {n}安多维塔-菲想冲过去，打算用她的身体来保护机器，但当她看到杰尼娃握住了手枪枪柄时，她僵在了原地。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi moves to shield the machine with her body, but freezes when she sees Jinevri grasp the handle of her pistol.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}安多维塔-菲想冲过去，打算用她的身体来保护机器，但当她看到杰尼娃握住手枪枪柄时，她僵在了原地。{/n}

languages.text: {n}アンドロヴェータ・ファイは自身の身体で機械を守るために動いた。しかし、ジネヴリがピストルの柄を握るのを見た瞬間、動きを止めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi moves to shield the machine with her body, but freezes when she sees Jinevri grasp the handle of her pistol.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アンドロベータ・ファイは自身の身体で機械を守るために動いた。しかし、ジネブラが見えた途端に固まった。すると、ジネブラはピストルを握った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Phi setzt an, die Maschine mit ihrem Körper zu schützen, erstarrt jedoch, als sie sieht, wie Jinevri nach ihrer Pistole greift.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi moves to shield the machine with her body, but freezes when she sees Jinevri grasp the handle of her pistol.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Androveta-Phi setzt an, die Maschine mit ihrem Körper zu schützen, erstarrt jedoch, als sie sieht, wie Jinevra nach ihrer Pistole greift.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Fi, makineye bedeniyle kalkan olmak için harekete geçiyor. Ancak Jinevri'nin tabancasını kavradığını görünce donakalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi moves to shield the machine with her body, but freezes when she sees Jinevri grasp the handle of her pistol.{/n}
